name: @drupal/wallet_auth
description: Wallet authentication for Drupal using Wallet as a Protocol

scripts.build: rm -rf js/dist/* && npx vite build --config vite.config.connector.js && npx vite build --config vite.config.ui.js
scripts.dev: rm -rf js/dist/* && npx vite build --config vite.config.connector.js --watch --mode development & npx vite build --config vite.config.ui.js --watch --mode development
